title: Motley Fool Money: 05.03.2013
description: The stock market hits a new high on stronger-than-expected jobs numbers.  Our analysts talk about what it means for investors and delve into earnings news from Facebook, LinkedIn, Disney, Visa, Mastercard, and DreamWorks.  And the Daily Racing Form's Steven Crist talks about the business of betting on horses.
